name: Warmhearted
description:
Designer
Amanda Baker

Class/Semester
Game Design Technologies M102, Fall 2017

Engine
GameMaker Studio
Genre
Platformer

Description
Warmhearted is a platforming game meant to evoke the kind of wonder that comes with winter, and convey a story while doing it. In it, players must collect magical items in order to restore the power to an orb that keeps the world in balance.

http://mcgamedesign.com/
